Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndipo musatsutsane ndi anthu okhulupirira za m’Buku pokhapokha kutakhala koyenera kutero, kupatula okhawo amene amachita zoipa. Nena, “Ife timakhulupirira mu izo zimene zavumbulutsidwa kwa ife ndi zimene zidavumbulutsidwa kwa inu ndipo Mulungu wathu ndi Mulungu wanu ndi mmodzi ndipo ife tadzipereka kwa Iye.”
Ndipokotero Ifetavumbulutsa Bukulolemekezekakwa iwe. Kotero onse amene tawapatsa Buku amakhulupirira mwa ilo ndipo palibe amene amakana chivumbulutso chathu kupatula anthu osalungama
Ndipo iwe siudalakatule za m’Buku lina ili lisanadze. Ndipo iwe siudalembe Buku lina lililonse ndi manja ako. Zikadatero, ndithudi, anthu oyankhula zachabechabe akadakayika
Iyayi! Izi ndi ziphunzitso zomveka zimene zili m’mitima ya iwo amene adapatsidwa nzeru ndipo palibe amene amakana chiphunzitso chathu kupatula wosalungama
Iwo amati, “Bwanji Ambuye wake sadamupatse zizindikiro?” Nena, ” Zizindikiro zonse zili ndi Mulungu ndipo ine ndine mchenjezi chabe.”
Kodi sizidakwanire kuti tavumbulutsa Buku lolemekezeka kwa iwe limene lili kuwerengedwa kwa iwo? Ndithudi m’Bukuli muli chifundo ndi chikumbutso kwa anthu okhulupirira

Nena, “Mulungu ndi mboni yokwana pakati pa ine ndi inu. Iye amadziwa chimene chili kumwamba ndi pa dziko lapansi.” Ndipo iwo amene amakhulupirira zabodza, ndiponso sakhulupirira mwa Mulungu, amenewa, ndi anthu olephera

Iwo amakukakamiza kuti ubweretse chilango msanga. Ndipo zikadakhala kuti nthawi yake siidakhazikitsidwe kale, ndithudi, chilango chikadakhala chitadza kale pa iwo. Ndithudi icho chidzadza pa iwo mwadzidzidzi pamene iwo sali kuchiganizira
Iwo ali kukukakamiza kuti ubweretse chilango. Ndithudi Gahena idzadzadza ndi anthu osakhulupirira
Patsiku limene chilango chidzadza pa iwo kuchokera kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi mawu adzati, “Lawani inu zipatso za ntchito zanu.”
oh inu akapolo anga amene mwakhulupirira! Ndithudi dziko langa lili ndi malo ambiri. Kotero ndipembedzeni Ine ndekha
Mzimu uliwonse udzalawa imfa. Pomaliza nonse mudzabwererakwa Ife

Ndipoiwoameneamakhulupirira ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, otere tidzawapatsa malo kumwamba amene pansi pake pamayenda mitsinje kuti akhale m’menemo mpaka kale kale. Eti kukoma mphotho ya iwo amene amachita zabwino
Iwo amapirira ndipo amaika chikhulupiriro chawo mwa Ambuye wawo ndi Mtetezi wawo
Kodi zilipo zolengedwa zingati zimene sizisunga chakudya chawo? Ndi Mulungu amene amazidyetsa izo pamodzi ndi inu nomwe. Ndipo Iye ndi wakumva ndi wodziwa

Ndithudi ngati iwe utawafunsa kuti kodi ndani amene adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi ndiponso amene adalamula dzuwa ndi mwezi kumvera malamulo ake? Ndithudi iwo adzayankha kuti ndi Mulungu. Nanga ndi chifukwa chiyani iwo amakana choonadi
Mulungu amapereka moolowa manja kwa aliyense amene Iye wamufuna ndipo amamana aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa chinthu china chilichonse

Ngati iwe ungawafunse kuti kodi ndani amene amagwetsa mvula ndipo amapereka moyo ku nthaka imene idali ya kufa? Ndithudi iwo adzayankha kuti, “Ndi Mulungu.” Nena “Kuyamikidwa konse kukhale kwa Iye.” Iyayi, ambiri a iwo sazindikira
Ndipo moyo wa padziko lapansi siuli kanthu koma masewera ndi kongotayira nthawi. Ukakhala moyo umene uli nkudza, umenewo ndiwo weniweni, iwo akadadziwa
Kotero iwo akamakwera zombo amapempha kwa Mulungu modzipereka ndi modzichepetsa. Koma Iye akawafikitsa pa mtunda mwaubwino, Ah! iwo amamufanizira Iye ndi zina zake
Kotero iwo amaonetsa kusathokoza pa zimene tawapatsa kuti akhoza kusangalala; ndipo iwo adzazindikira posachedwapa
Kodi iwo saona kuti tateteza malo odalitsika pamene anthu ena ali kutengedwa mwankhanza pa malo owazungulira? Kodi iwo adzakhala ali kukhulupirirabe zabodza ndi kukana ubwino wa Mulungu

Kodi woipitsitsa ndani kuposa munthu amene amapeka bodza lokhudza Mulungu kapena amene amati choonadi ndi chabodza pamene auzidwa za icho? Kodi Gahena siidzakhala malo okhalamo anthu onse osakhulupirira
Akakhala iwo amene amalimbikira kugwira ntchito yathu,ndithudi, Ife tidzawatsogolera ku njira zathu. Ndithudi Mulungu amakhala ndi iwo amene amachita zabwino
